module: Module-level comment: The altera_reset_synchronizer module executes reset synchronization, handling both asynchronous (instant reset) and synchronous (reset per clock edge) resets via its adjustable flip-flop chain. Inputs include the 'reset_in' (reset signal) and 'clk' (system clock). The output is 'reset_out', a reset signal synchronized to the system clock. Internal signal 'altera_reset_synchronizer_int_chain' forms the flip-flop chain for managing resets and 'altera_reset_synchronizer_int_chain_out' carries the final reset_out signal. Behavior depends on the ASYNC_RESET parameter, affecting both internal operations and the reset_out signal synchronization.
